sqlMap.select: SELECT B.FUNCTION_ID ,B.FUNCTION_NAME,B.FUNCTION_EN_NAME ,B.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID ,B.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID ,B.URL ,B.SYS_STATUS_ID ,B.SHOWNUM FROM SYS_BUSINESS_SYSTEM A , SYS_FUNCTION B WHERE A.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID = B.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID AND A.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID = #businessSysId# AND B.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID = #id# AND B.tenant_id=#tenantId# and A.tenant_id=#tenantId# ORDER BY B.SHOWNUM
